description.lang: The Alarm.com Interlogix Simon XT/i Radio Module is an add-on module that attaches inside of an Interlogix Simon XT or XTi security panel. It communicates between the security panel and the Alarm.com cloud service via a cellular network. A user is able to remotely control the security panel and its associated Alarm.com Interactive Services (including Z-Wave devices) via a web application or mobile app.

deviceDescription.productName: Alarm.com Interlogix Simon XT/i Radio Module

description.lang: Z-Wave Plus Lifeline - when the controller is reset (new home id, etc) it will send a DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION to all associated nodes
